main event: A fireball was observed over Pennsylvania on 27 November 1963.
interesting points: The observation occurred at 6:59 PM EST, The duration of the observation was 30 seconds, Only one object was reported, The object was described as bright and moved in a north-west direction, The report requested meteor data and clarified that it was not a UFO report.
witness description: Reports of the fireball were made from a wide area.
